trans-unit.source: Azure App Service and its impact on existing Azure services
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service and its impact on existing Azure services

trans-unit.source: Explains how the new Azure App Service and its features impact existing services in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Explains how the new Azure App Service and its features impact existing services in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service and existing Azure services
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service and existing Azure services

trans-unit.source: This article outlines the changes to existing Azure services as part of the change to bring together several Azure services into [Azure App Service](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/app-service/), a new integrated offering.
trans-unit.target: This article outlines the changes to existing Azure services as part of the change to bring together several Azure services into [Azure App Service](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/app-service/), a new integrated offering.

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: [Azure App Service](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/app-service/) is a new and unique cloud service that enables developers to create web and mobile apps for any platform and any device.
trans-unit.target: [Azure App Service](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/app-service/) is a new and unique cloud service that enables developers to create web and mobile apps for any platform and any device.

trans-unit.source: App Service is an integrated solution designed to streamline repeated coding functions, integrate with enterprise and SaaS systems, and automate business processes while meeting your needs for security, reliability, and scalability.
trans-unit.target: App Service is an integrated solution designed to streamline repeated coding functions, integrate with enterprise and SaaS systems, and automate business processes while meeting your needs for security, reliability, and scalability.

trans-unit.source: App Service brings together the following existing Azure services - [Websites](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/websites/), [Mobile Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/mobile-services/), and [Biztalk Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/biztalk-services/) into a single combined service, while adding powerful new capabilities.
trans-unit.target: App Service brings together the following existing Azure services - [Websites](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/websites/), [Mobile Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/mobile-services/), and [Biztalk Services](http://azure.microsoft.com/services/biztalk-services/) into a single combined service, while adding powerful new capabilities.

trans-unit.source: App Service allows you to host the following app types:
trans-unit.target: App Service allows you to host the following app types:

trans-unit.source: Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Web Apps

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps

trans-unit.source: API Apps
trans-unit.target: API Apps

trans-unit.source: Logic Apps
trans-unit.target: Logic Apps

trans-unit.source: The following table explains how existing Azure services map to App Service and the app types available within it.
trans-unit.target: The following table explains how existing Azure services map to App Service and the app types available within it.

trans-unit.source: Existing Azure Service
trans-unit.target: Existing Azure Service

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: What changed
trans-unit.target: What changed

trans-unit.source: Azure Websites
trans-unit.target: Azure Websites

trans-unit.source: Web Apps
trans-unit.target: Web Apps

trans-unit.source: For Azure Websites, App Service is strictly limited to changing the name Websites to Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: For Azure Websites, App Service is strictly limited to changing the name Websites to Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: All your existing instances of Websites are now Web Apps in App Service.
trans-unit.target: All your existing instances of Websites are now Web Apps in App Service.

trans-unit.source: You can access your existing websites via the Azure Portal, where you will find all your existing sites under Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: You can access your existing websites via the Azure Portal, where you will find all your existing sites under Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: Web Hosting Plan is now App Service Plan.
trans-unit.target: Web Hosting Plan is now App Service Plan.

trans-unit.source: An App Service Plan can host any app type of App Service, such as Web, Mobile, Logic, or API apps.
trans-unit.target: An App Service Plan can host any app type of App Service, such as Web, Mobile, Logic, or API apps.

trans-unit.source: Azure App Service Web Apps is in General Availability.
trans-unit.target: Azure App Service Web Apps is in General Availability.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Web Apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Web Apps.

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Services
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Services

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps

trans-unit.source: Mobile Services continue to be available as a standalone service and remain fully supported.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Services continue to be available as a standalone service and remain fully supported.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps is a new app type in App Service, which integrates all of the functionality of Mobile Services and more.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps is a new app type in App Service, which integrates all of the functionality of Mobile Services and more.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Apps is in public preview.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Apps is in public preview.

trans-unit.source: It is easy to migrate from Mobile Services to Mobile Apps.
trans-unit.target: It is easy to migrate from Mobile Services to Mobile Apps.

trans-unit.source: Since Mobile Apps are still in preview it is not yet recommended for running production apps.
trans-unit.target: Since Mobile Apps are still in preview it is not yet recommended for running production apps.

trans-unit.source: As part of App Service, Mobile Apps get new capabilities beyond Mobile Services, such as integration with on-premises and SaaS systems, staging slots, WebJobs, better scaling options, and more.
trans-unit.target: As part of App Service, Mobile Apps get new capabilities beyond Mobile Services, such as integration with on-premises and SaaS systems, staging slots, WebJobs, better scaling options, and more.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Mobile Apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Mobile Apps.

trans-unit.source: API Apps
trans-unit.target: API Apps

trans-unit.source: API Apps is a new app type in App Service that lets you easily build and consume APIs in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: API Apps is a new app type in App Service that lets you easily build and consume APIs in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about API Apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about API Apps.

trans-unit.source: Logic Apps
trans-unit.target: Logic Apps

trans-unit.source: Logic Apps is a new app type in App Service that lets you easily automate business process.
trans-unit.target: Logic Apps is a new app type in App Service that lets you easily automate business process.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Logic Apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Logic Apps.

trans-unit.source: Azure BizTalk Services
trans-unit.target: Azure BizTalk Services

trans-unit.source: BizTalk API Apps
trans-unit.target: BizTalk API Apps

trans-unit.source: BizTalk Services continue to be available as a standalone service and remain fully supported.
trans-unit.target: BizTalk Services continue to be available as a standalone service and remain fully supported.

trans-unit.source: All the capabilities of BizTalk Services are integrated into App Service as API Apps enabling users to perform enterprise application integration and B2B integration scenarios with any of the app types in App Service
trans-unit.target: All the capabilities of BizTalk Services are integrated into App Service as API Apps enabling users to perform enterprise application integration and B2B integration scenarios with any of the app types in App Service

trans-unit.source: With Logic Apps you can now automate business processes using a visual design experience to create workflows
trans-unit.target: With Logic Apps you can now automate business processes using a visual design experience to create workflows

trans-unit.source: To learn more, please visit [App Service documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/app-service/).
trans-unit.target: To learn more, please visit [App Service documentation](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/app-service/).

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
